REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F E f0161 reute r f BC-NUMAC-OIL-AND-GAS-LTD 03-11 0072

TEXT.TITLE: NUMAC OIL AND GAS LTD <NMC> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 23 cts vs 77 cts Oper net 5,255,179 vs 17.6 mln Revs 37.8 mln vs 73.7 mln NOTE: Cash flow 19.5 mln dlrs or 86 cts shr vs 36.7 mln dlrs or 1.62 dlrs shr. 1985 net excludes 32 ct shr loss from discontinued operations. Gross proven and probable reserves of crude oil and natural gas liquiids 18.4 mln barrels, off 7.6 pct from a year before. Reuter
